overview.en: DCC gave birth to its first use case of Chainspay. Chainspay is a world known enterprise level digital asset third party payment platform. It empowers multiple commercial uses such as crypto exchange hot wallet, crypto wallet, airdrop, dApps, quantitative trading etc.
overview.zh: DCC首发产品链付Chainspay平台落地。链付是全球领先的企业级数字资产第三方支付平台。它可以支撑交易所钱包服务、To C数字货币钱包、空投、DAPP、量化交易等多种业务场景。
